def_cn: （两个孩子相互投球、第三个孩子站在中间设法抢球的）抢球游戏
def_en: Piggy-in-the-middle or pig-in-the-middle is a game in which two children throw a ball to each other and a child standing between them tries to catch it.

def_cn: （两方争吵时）夹在中间的窘境，受夹板气
def_en: If someone is piggy-in-the-middle or pig-in-the-middle, they are unwillingly involved in a dispute between two people or groups.
